Interface TabbedContainer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    Commmon methods for a TabbedContainer.

    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • addTab

        int addTab(TabItemDisplay display,
         Component component)
        Parameters:
        display - The description of the tab.
        component - The component to associate with the tab.
        Returns:
        The ID of the new tab.
        See Also:
        Tabs.addTab(TabItemDisplay)

      • getComponent

        Component getComponent(int id)
        Get the component for the tab with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The tab ID.
        Returns:
        The Component associated with the tab.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if not tab is found with the given ID.

      • getComponentAt

        Component getComponentAt(int index)
        Get the component for the tab at the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - The tab index.
        Returns:
        The Component associated with the tab.
        Throws:
        ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is outside of the available tabs.

        Returns:
        the ID of the tab.

      • getSelectedComponent

        Component getSelectedComponent()
        Get the currently selected component. If no component is selected, null is returned.
        Returns:
        The selected component or null if non selected.

      • getSelectedId

        int getSelectedId()
        Returns:
        The tab ID or Integer.MIN_VALUE if no tab is selected.
        See Also:
        Tabs.getSelectedId()
